title: Grand Strategy Style Map
description: A grand strategy map framework for unreal
longDescription:
The Grand Strategy Style Map plugin is a tool designed to facilitate the development of map based grand strategy games in Unreal Engine. Inspired by the grand strategy games developed by Paradox Interactive.

With this plugin, you gain the ability to integrate and interact with complex maps in your Unreal Engine projects.

The plugin provides intuitive controls for users to interact with an interactive map, allowing them to navigate around the map and click on individual provinces.


Key features include

  • Clickable Provinces: the map is split into provinces that can be interacted with mouse inputs. Supports spherical and flat maps.
  • Seamless Integration: Easily integrate the plugin into existing Unreal Engine projects
  • Customization Options: Tailor the appearance and behavior of the map to suit the requirements of your project
  • Scalability: Adapts to the scope of your game, from a map with just a few provinces to a world map with hundreds of provinces


What this plugin does not do:

Create the lookup texture responsible for identifying provinces on mouse inputs.

Create the data associated with the map.



The files needed to run the default implementation of the map are explained in the getting started page : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1N9qjFMi8polaDmq3sserXZcLLUEE4rcekSjpjBMkjco/edit?usp=sharing

Example files are provided with the plugin.


This plugin is being supported and I am working on adding more features such as pathfinding for units on the map.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Support for a clickable map split into provinces, either as flat map or a globe based one
  • Controls to navigate around the different type of maps.
  • Generate maps depending on data provided: for example create a political map based on the country that controls each province.
  • Ability to edit the map data in a game session and save it to a json file.
  • Example maps of available types of maps to help you get started.
  • Example materials to help you customize your map appearance.
  • Clear separation between the map data and its visual representation.

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

None of them represent actual real world data. They serve just as example data to show the functionality of the plugin.
